models.rows: Two rows representing what I bring and what I look for in a role.

items.title: Fast Execution, High Ownership
items.description: I move quickly, take responsibility end-to-end, and don't wait to be unblocked.

items.title: Product + Tech Mindset
items.description: I can think in systems, constraints, and user impact — not just features.

items.title: Delivery Ahead of Time
items.description: I prefer clear scope → fast loops → shipping earlier than planned.

items.title: Clarity & Structured Thinking
items.description: I communicate decisions simply so teams stay aligned and move faster.

items.title: Remote-first, Flexible Work Style
items.description: I work best in environments that value trust over time-tracking.

items.title: Ownership-Driven Culture
items.description: I enjoy roles where I'm accountable for outcomes, not just tasks.

items.title: Fast-Moving, Builder-Focused Teams
items.description: I thrive where iteration, learning, and action matter more than process.

items.title: Mutual Respect & Autonomy
items.description: Clear communication, psychological safety, and space to think deeply.
